about.name: Sylvester Delta Ijie, PhD (Law)
about.description: Sylvester Ijie is a distinguished legal practitioner and thought leader with extensive experience in Nigerian law. His expertise spans corporate and commercial law, maritime law, dispute resolution, and international humanitarian law.
highlights: PhD in International Humanitarian Law, specializing in the Rwanda Armed Conflict.
Expertise in litigation, legal strategy, and corporate law.

about2.subtitle: Trusted Legal Advisors
about2.title: Delivering Exceptional Legal Solutions
about2.description: Dr. Sylvester Delta Ijie is a Barrister and Solicitor of the Supreme Court of Nigeria and the Principal Partner of S. D. IJIE & ASSOCIATES, Legal Practitioners, and Notaries Public. He obtained his Bachelor of Laws (LL.B Hons) from Edo State University, Ekpoma, and his B.L from the Nigerian Law School. He furthered his education with a Masters in Law (LL.M) in Commercial Law from the University of Lagos, and a Doctorate (Ph.D) in Law specializing in Jurisprudence and International Law from Ambrose Alli University, Ekpoma. As a seasoned legal expert, Dr. Ijie has extensive experience in Maritime/Admiralty Law, Company Secretariat and Corporate Practices, Property Law, Intellectual Property, Corporate Finance, Mergers & Acquisitions, Debt Recovery, and both Civil & Criminal Litigation. His expertise extends to legal research and consultancy, making him a formidable advocate in Nigerian courts. Driven by a commitment to justice, he continues to provide strategic legal counsel, ensuring clients receive top-tier representation and legal solutions tailored to their needs.
